Title: Allows for NYSTRS retirees to change their retirement plan beneficiary to a spouse at any time either prior to or after retirement
Summary: Allows for NYSTRS retirees to change their retirement plan beneficiary to a spouse at any time either prior to or after retirement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing NYSTRS retirees to change their retirement plan beneficiary to a spouse at any time prior to or after retirement
